body:
Comment 1 by **eric.bergstrome**: 
I should explain my proposed fix.  The symbols in intvector_test.go that are undefined
should be coming from 
nogen_test.go.  But the 6g invocation leaves out all the *_test.go files other than
intvector_test.go because of the 
way the GOTESTFILES variable is being passed.  The fix ensures that GOTESTFILES gets set
properly to contain all 
the *_test.go files instead of just intvector_test.go.
